channel.title: RS2HD windows 7 HHHEEEELPPPP!
channel.description: k, i got bored of 317's and 517's so im moving onto 562 (rs2hd) i cnt seem to run the server on windows seven. this is my code in run.bat: [code]@echo off title TkoScape By Apache Ah64 Color 4 cd src cd .. java -Xms250m -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/* com.rs2hd.Main pause[/code] when i try to run i get this: [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] any help would be awesome thx.

item.title: RS2HD windows 7 HHHEEEELPPPP!
item.dc:creator: @devilshady devilshady
item.description:
@devilshady wrote:

there you go use mine

@echo off title rs2hd compiler echo Preparing... mkdir bin cd src copy log4j.xml .. cd .. move log4j.xml bin/ echo Compiling core... "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo completed... echo running server... title Server. java -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar com.rs2hd.Main pause

Dont worry about the java version it says 18 but iam using 25.
I hope this will help

Read full topic

item.title: RS2HD windows 7 HHHEEEELPPPP!
item.dc:creator: @owns_reece owns reece
item.description:
@owns_reece wrote:

k, i got bored of 317’s and 517’s so im moving onto 562 (rs2hd) i cnt seem to run the server on windows seven.
this is my code in run.bat:

@echo off title TkoScape By Apache Ah64 Color 4 cd src cd .. java -Xms250m -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/* com.rs2hd.Main pause
when i try to run i get this:

'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
any help would be awesome thx.

Read full topic
